animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very big animal.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🥜 I use my nose to pick up my favorite food.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I have a wet nose and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in ponds. What am I?
I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.
🍃 I love to eat acacia leaves.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Some people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?
I hiss and slither. I have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I can live in many environments.
🐭 Some people are afraid of me, but I eat mice

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🗣️ I can make lots of noises.

animal.question: I'm black and white and like to eat bamboo. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I love to eat bamboo shoots.

food.question: I am long and yellow and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of sunshine.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often poured into cereal.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. Sometimes a worm lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 You can bake a pie with me.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?
I am small and green and grow in a pod. You might not want to eat me for dinner, but I'm good for you. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often served as a side dish.
🍲 I snap when you break me.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. People eat me with butter or jam. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often eaten for breakfast.
🔥 I need heat to be created.

food.question: I am yellow and sweet, and grow on a cob. You can eat me right off the cob, or make popcorn out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can pop me in the microwave.

food.question: I am a fruit that is both sweet and sour, and you need to peel me to eat me. I am the same color as my name. What am I?
I am made from tomatoes, but I'm not a tomato. I'm often used on pizza or pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I often go on top of noodles.
🍅 Tomatoes are a key ingredient to make me.
🍕 I can make pizza taste better.

food.question: I am a frozen treat that comes in many flavors. You can eat me in a cone or a cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am often eaten on a hot day.
🍧 You can put sprinkles on me.
🍫 Chocolate and vanilla are popular types.
